title: Skrillex - First Of The Year (Equinox) [Hellsing AMV]
description: ///IMPORTANT NOTE!/// Gonna, go ahead and put this out there. Because I feel it is necessary. I'm am not in any business of editing, I do it for fun on occasion (Almost rarely now) and sometimes I post them. Your criticism is welcomed, and even encouraged, but please if its about how this AMV doesn't deserve the views I don't need to hear it. I don't make money off of it. I don't have ownership of it. I don't claim to be good at editing being casually self taught. This video is very old and I had it made even half a year before I decided to post it. I don't care if you think its not deserving of the views it gets either. Personally I only ever posted it because I thought the song matched it good. I did do what editing I could using only windows movie maker at the time. And at the time, the only thing I could really do was cut the clips where I wanted to. And to make something as small as another cut without throwing it out of sync I had to restart the entire video from the start and wait for it to reach that part. If I missed I would have to do it again and again and that means it took me 2 minutes even 4 minutes at times just to make a single cut. It took a lot of patience to not have any idea what I was doing and have to work with the worst program to edit with ever. So i'd appreciate if you could at least respect that and give constructive criticism on my newer videos. I have a lot to upload but I have a hard time with copyright. (AGAIN, for those who come on here and post rude comments because they think it doesn't deserve what it got, I didn't put this up here expecting anything, no views, and I certainly didn't put this up here with the idea I could make money.) I'm in college now and I'm busy with that but I saw a comment that really got to me, being an amateur who questions his own posts constantly it doesn't help to hear that kind of stuff. If you took the time to read this wall of text, thank you sincerely I appreciate all support for my videos its a hobby that I have a lot of fun with but it gets a lot less fun when people are putting you down. Anime : Hellsing Ultimate Episode : 1 Artist : Skrillex Song : First Of The Year(Equinox) NOTE TO YOUTUBE: THIS VIDEO IS PURELY FAN-MADE AND IS IN NO WAY ASSOCIATED WITH THE MUSICAL ARTIST OR ANIME COMPANY IN ANY WAY! I don't own the anime or the music this video is purely fan made. Hellsing AMV
